about_the_game:
"Eva's Hook" is a 2.5D platformer that tests your precision and reflexes through a series of challenging levels. Follow Eva on her journey to break free from the icy prison that holds her, armed only with her trusty grappling hook.

Created entirely by a solo indie developer, this game is a tribute to pure gameplay – no frills, no intrusive storytelling. It's just you, your mouse, and your ability to master precise movement.

Key Features:

  • 🪝 Intuitive Grappling Hook Mechanic – Move swiftly and accurately with a mouse-controlled grappling system.

  • 🎯 Tight Platforming – Perfect for players who love technical challenges. Every jump and swing counts.

  • 💎 Collect and Explore – Gather coins scattered throughout the levels.

  • ⚡ Multiple Game Modes:

    • Campaign – Traverse 6 core levels and unlock 3 bonus levels with evolving challenges.

    • Speedrun Mode – Race against the clock by selecting levels and aiming for the fastest times.

  • 🌟 Dynamic Events – Experience unexpected shifts that will test and reshape your approach.

  • 🎮 Three Difficulty Levels – Whether you're here for a casual run or a hardcore challenge, there's a mode for you.

"Eva's Hook" won't tell you an elaborate story, but it will offer hours of engaging gameplay. By the end of this adventure, when Eva finally shatters her icy prison, it will be thanks to your skill.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A 2.5D Platformer with a Grappling Hook, Collectibles, and a Timer for an extra Challenge while different Events are trying to make you fail, 3 different Difficulties, but even the Easiest one could be a hard time for you !
